Settings.Name: Log level
Settings.Description: 0 = Off, 1 = Error, 2 = Warn, 3 = Info, 4 = Debug, 5 = Trace (Anything higher than Info will only be logged to the log.txt, not the SE console)

Settings.Name: Profile Execution Status View
Settings.Description: Sets how/if the Profile Execution Status window gets displayed. Changes will not be reflected mid-execution.

Settings.Name: Launch The Inspector
Settings.Description: Launch the Inspector tab in its own independent window - will rejoin the main MCM window on close
